title: Soil and Sand Villa / axialstudio
description: Sand and Soil Villa, located in Jogjakarta, Central Java, Indonesia, is a harmonious blend of contemporary design and nature, thoughtfully crafted to embrace the region's tropical climate. Emphasizing simplicity, comfort, and sustainability. The villa features natural materials and open spaces that seamlessly integrate with the surrounding environment.
author: Miwa Negoro

title: Villa SOFIA / nm+a | T | L | nestor medina arquitectura
description: Inside the highlands of eastern Antioquia is Villa Sofia, a project conceived from memory and remembrance, which seeks to continue the generational legacy of its owners, from the time of the colonial typology characteristic of the area, as the origin of the new home that intends to continue growing over time.
